scripts.dev:frontend:only: wait-on http://localhost:3333/health && cd frontend && pnpm run dev
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install && cd ../mcp-server && pnpm install && cd ../scheduler && pnpm install
scripts.clean: docker-compose down -v && rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules mcp-server/node_modules scheduler/node_modules node_modules
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm run build && cd ../frontend && pnpm run build && cd ../mcp-server && pnpm run build && cd ../scheduler && pnpm run build
